data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of La Union.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Union, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of La Union.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of La Union, Philippines the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in La Union, Philippines to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Sama-Bajau people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, move the 35,953 believers in the state of La Union to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 35,953 believers in the state of La Union to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary:
the state of La Union, Philippines has a population of 258,100.

We estimate La Union has 35,953 people who might know Jesus, 198,829 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,319 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of La Union to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
